question: Which company produces the Oncomine Dx target test?
ideal_answer: The Oncomine Dx Target Test Panel is produced by Thermo Fisher Scientific.

snippets.text: All specimens were screened by using two antibodies (clone D4D6 from Cell Signaling Technology and clone SP384 from Ventana Medical Systems), and the different interpretation criteria were compared with break-apart FISH (Vysis). FISH-positive samples were also analyzed with next-generation sequencing (Oncomine Dx Target Test Panel, Thermo Fisher Scientific)
